title: Mobile Payments
body: Just curious as to why mobile payments aren't working? As someone who has been using mobile payments almost every week for the past couple years I'm quite frustrated, would this be a problem on your end; or mine?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Mobile payment is still an option for me, what issue are you experiencing exactly?

You may want to contact Boku directly for assistance.
Yeah it's still an option, it probably is Boku, but basically i reply with "y" as prompted and nothing happens, it's like the message hasn't even been sent.

Yea, sounds like a boku problem.

Let me know what they say.
Well, apparently there is such thing as "Spending too much money"
How do the mobile payments work? it never works for me. I buy a $30 Vodaphone cap and it never works. Can someone help me on this?
It should charge it to your current pre-paid balance. afaik.
More than likely you've simply made too many transactions, rather than spending too much money.
